### üé® Typography Features

#### Complete Style Attributes
- **Font Family**: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
- **Font Style**: normal (common style)
- **Font Variant**: normal (common variant)
- **Font Weight**: normal (400 weight)
- **Font Size**: 18px (optimal base size)
- **Line Height**: normal (default line height)
- **Color**: #000000 (standard black)

#### Typography Scale
- **H1**: 32px - Main headings
- **H2**: 24px - Section headings
- **H3**: 20px - Subsection headings
- **H4**: 18px - Component headings
- **H5**: 16px - Small headings
- **H6**: 14px - Micro headings
- **Body**: 18px - Standard text
- **Small**: 14px - Secondary text
- **Large**: 20px - Emphasized text

#### UI Elements
- **Buttons**: Arial styling with hover effects
- **Inputs**: Consistent Arial typography
- **Selects**: Dropdown menus with Arial fonts
- **Tables**: Headers and cells with Arial styling
- **Navigation**: Menu items and links
- **Forms**: Labels and form elements
- **Code**: Monospace for code blocks
